page.title: 12GAMES AT HOME
page.content: At home I usually play with my{ {board games.}These are games using a dice and moving counters around the board. There are many different types of board games. I often play with my{doll's {things.}She has a wardrobe, bed and dressing table. She has many different cloths to wear. I like playing{sevenses}against the wall in our porch. You have to throw the ball seven times underarm against the wall, overarm six times, five bounces, underleg four times, bounce so the ball hits the wall three times, throw it to the bottom of the wall twice and finally throw it up and catch it.
